wikipedia_page.main:
Mark Glendinning (born 2 April 1970) is a Northern Irish retired footballer.
Glendinning started his career at Bangor and later moved on to Glenavon and then to Glentoran.

response: His first European game was for Bangor F.C. against APOEL in the 1993-94 European Cup Winners' Cup. His free kick led to Bangor's opener. In the second leg his corner led to Mark Glendinning's finish in Cyprus.
